overview: When the Parc des Princes becomes the field of the Queens or how to fight against sexism and lesbophobia in the arena of clich√©s. A soccer match but not only. A committed and joyful match, supported by a week of actions, which highlight the determination of these players to dribble to assert their rights. Sport as a vector of exchange and openness, soccer to get out of stereotypes and let bodies and people live.
title: Foot for Love
